text: Deutschland steht zur Ukraine: Solidarität in schwierigen Zeiten. #NothilfeUkraine 🇺🇦💪🏽🇩🇪 Russia's brutal war against Ukraine has caused immeasurable suffering. It's our duty to support Ukraine in its fight for freedom & self-defense. 💥🔫🚨 Let's stand together and make a difference! 🌟💪🏽💕 #URC24 🇩🇪🇺🇦
